title: It's Time for a Serious Discussion About Biden's Mental Health | Guest: Rep. Andy Barr | 9/29/22
description:
Glenn and Stu share their thoughts on Lizzo playing James Madison's 200-year-old crystal flute. Netflix's series on serial killer Jeffrey Dahmer is getting criticism for its negative LGBTQ+ representation. Pat Gray joins Glenn and Stu to go over President Biden's mental state after he seemingly forgot that a representative had passed away. Glenn discusses the destruction and manipulation central banks are engaged in. Rep. Andy Barr joins Glenn to expose the dangers of a central bank digital currency and share what can be done to avoid it. Glenn shares the story of the biggest robbery in history, done by the FBI. Glenn shares what scriptures, and what Coolio song, he uses to help keep him from letting fear take over.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
